Text.valUnicode: This program demonstates the utilization of the NotifyIcon control of the .NET framework. Your system tray now shows an icon that serves as the RIA Demo's notifyer.
Whenever a new order is entered to the database, the notifier will inform you about such new order. Clicking on the notifier message will open up Today's Orders view.
Right-Click on the NotifyIcon to show the context menu set for it. From this context menu you can activate various activites like entering a new order or opening up Today's Orders view.
You can hide this window by pressing the button or from the NotifyIcon context menu by choosing "Hide NotifyIcon Manager" option.
To display this window again, choose "Show NotifyIcon Manager" option from the context menu.

ExpSyntax.val: DNSet({0,1}.BalloonTipText,'New Order #'&Trim(Str({0,15},'10'))&' was just submitted. Click here to view in Today''s Orders')
DNSet({0,1}.BalloonTipText,'This is an example text displayed by the Notify Icon')
